p: All the strains used in this study (one WT, one hamster-adapted and seventeen re-encoded) were produced using the ISA method, that enables recovery of infectious viruses after transfection into permissive cells of overlapping subgenomic DNA fragments covering the entire genome ( Aubry et al. 2014). All fragment combination schemes used for virus production are detailed in Fig. 1 and in the ‘Fragment combination’ section.
